parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ error: 'unauthorized', status: 401, message: 'Invalid or expired token' }) }}

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO chats (user_id, company_id, title, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  CAST('{{ $json.user_id }}' AS UUID),
  {{ $json.company_id ? "CAST('" + $json.company_id + "' AS UUID)" : "NULL" }},
  '{{ $json.title }}',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
)
RETURNING id, user_id, company_id, title, created_at;

INSERT INTO audit_events (user_id, action, resource_type, resource_id, metadata, ip, user_agent)
VALUES (
  $1::uuid,
  $2,
  $3,
  $4::uuid,
  $5::jsonb,
  $6,
  $7
)
RETURNING id;

options.queryReplacement: ={{ [$('Prepare Audit Data').item.json.user_id, $('Prepare Audit Data').item.json.action, $('Prepare Audit Data').item.json.resource_type, $('Prepare Audit Data').item.json.resource_id, $('Prepare Audit Data').item.json.metadata, $('Prepare Audit Data').item.json.ip, $('Prepare Audit Data').item.json.user_agent] }}
